p:
The three branches shown in Fig 2A were separated by visual inspection, with the negative branch consisting of sites i where C ( i) < 0.04 and S
i < 0.05 âˆ’ 0.7 C ( i) , the positive branch consisting of sites i where C ( i) > 0.041 and S
i < 0.02 + 0.5 C ( i) , and the zero branch containing sites that are in neither other branch.
